name: node-project-template

scripts.docs: git fetch; git checkout documentation; jsdoc src/ -d jsdocsgenerated; git config --local user.email 'action@github.com'; git config --local user.name 'Github Action'; git add -A; git commit -m 'Generated JSDocs'; git push
scripts.serve: echo 'TODO: Add your serve command here
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp src/*.js build # TODO: Replace with your build command
scripts.preversion: git fetch --tags && npm run lint:check && npm test

description: Repository for documentation and code of Team 18
author: Team 18
